Golf days, fundraising dinners, charity auctions  don't get 18A receipts because donor gets something in returtn. #NPODialogue
Pro bono work does NOT get 18A receipt. #NPODialogue #SARSTEU
#SARSTEU gives a non compliant organisation as much as 12 months to comply. Unless it is intentional non compliance! #NPODialogue
Lots of questions about issuing of 18As - what is bono fide donation? #NPODialogue
No 18A receipts granted retrospectively. MUST be approved first #SARSTEU #NPODialogue
Now we get to Section 18A. Everyone groans. #SARSTEU #NPODialogue
Grant exemption from income tax ONLY. Sometimes grant exemption from donations tax, skills levy and estate duty but not always.#NPODialogue
Bank statement must be in the name of the applying organisation - #SARSTEU. #NPODialogue
Must choose the right Public Officer - important for #governance - SARS TEU. #NPODialogue
If you register a company #NPC, automatically registered with SARS. So MUST apply for tax exemption or you will be liable. #NPODialogue
New process: single registration. Legal entity registration. @sarstax #NPODialogue
About 40,000 PBOs on @sarstax database. Over 100,000 on NPO databasebase.
Spend public funds, therefore must be accountable as PBOs - @sarstax
Our unit is an anomaly in @sarstax - we give away tax, rather than collect. Minee from TEU #NPODialogue
Collaboration helps us find new ways to break down barriers - Colin Habberton from @GivenGain #NPODialogue
